releaseNote.zh-Hans:
**安卓用户推荐[前往应用商店](market://details?id=life.mysit.sit_life)进行更新**

- 新增 | 消费记录中的充值按钮
- 新增 | 课表同步功能，存在变动时可自动或手动一键同步
- 新增 | 检测并提醒OA账号和密码在外部的变动
- 新增 | 教育邮箱设置页面
- 修复 | 研究生课表导入问题
- 修复 | 应网办和电费不再需要连接校园网
- 优化 | 课表预制卡片样式
- 优化 | 教育邮箱的界面
releaseNote.en:
**It is recommended to [get from the app store](market://details?id=life.mysit.sit_life) for Android users.**

- Added a top-up button in the expense records.
- Introduced timetable sync feature. auto or one-click sync is available when changes occur.
- Detection and alert for changes to OA account&password outside the app.
- Added a settings page for edu email.
- Fixed postgraduates timetable importing issues.
- SIT YWB and electricity balance no longer require the campus network.
- Redesigned timetable patch prefab cards.
- Redesigned UI of the edu email.
